welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Halls, a charming town known for its friendly people and beautiful scenery. We invite you to immerse yourself in the local culture and experience all that Halls has to offer. Enjoy your stay and make unforgettable memories!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Mc Ghee Tyson Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A at Mc Ghee Tyson Airport serves domestic flights for major airlines.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B at Mc Ghee Tyson Airport serves domestic flights for low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport by selecting the network and agreeing to the terms and conditions.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Gatlinburg Airport serves all commercial flights and features a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Gatlinburg Airport caters to private and chartered flights, providing a luxurious and exclusive experience for passengers.

wifi.note: Passengers can enjoy complimentary WiFi throughout the airport.
